languages.text:
"Но плеть ее песнь о возмездии пела для тех, кто отличный
От праведных путь избирал, и клинки достигали отступника
Сердца в час верный. Как бы старательно трус ни скрывал биенье
В груди, смерть слышит его. И примет свое".

это очень условный "свободны стих", у которого в каждом четверостишье повторяется только одинаковое количество слогов в каждой строке (18/ 19 / 18 / 12). Если получится придержаться чего-то подобного в других языках — будет здорово

"But some would choose to leave the righteous path.
These earned penance in due time:
her whip sings vengeance on renegade menace.
Her blades pass sentence.
For cowards seek to hide their hearts,
but death makes no pretendence;
it takes what it is due in essence."
languages.original_text:
"Но плеть ее песнь о возмездии пела для тех, кто отличный
От праведных путь избирал, и клинки достигали отступника
Сердца в час верный. Как бы старательно трус ни скрывал биенье
В груди, смерть слышит его. И примет свое".

traits.locale_text:
"But some would choose to leave the righteous path. These earned penance
in due time: her whip sings vengeance on renegade menace. Her blades pass sentence.
For cowards seek to hide their hearts, but death makes no pretendence;
it takes what it is due in essence."

For cowards seek to hide their hearts, but death makes no pretendence;
it takes what it is due in essence."

languages.text:
« Mais du droit chemin certains se sont écartés.
Ceux-là méritent pénitence à point nommé ;
et son fouet chante vengeance sur la menace reniée.
Sa lame la sentence vient appliquer.
Car les lâches leur cœur cherchent à cacher,
mais à prétendre la mort ne se laisse aller ;
elle prend ce qui lui est dû sans tergiverser. »
languages.original_text:
"But some would choose to leave the righteous path.
These earned penance in due time:
her whip sings vengeance on renegade menace.
Her blades pass sentence.
For cowards seek to hide their hearts,
but death makes no pretendence;
it takes what it is due in essence."

traits.locale_text:
« Mais certains s'écartent délibérément du droit chemin. Ceux-là méritent pénitence
à point nommé ; son fouet chante alors vengeance sur la menace reniée. Sa lame la sentence vient appliquer.
Car les lâches leur cœur cherchent à cacher, mais à prétendre la mort ne se laisse aller ;
elle prend ce qui lui est dû sans tergiverser. »

languages.text:
«Pero algunos dejaron el camino recto,
debiendo penitencia. Con tiempo,
su látigo fustiga a los renegados sin clemencia.
Son sus hojas las que dictan sentencia.
Pues los cobardes ocultan el corazón,
mas la muerte no tiene clemencia;
se lleva lo que le pertenece: su esencia»
languages.original_text:
"But some would choose to leave the righteous path.
These earned penance in due time:
her whip sings vengeance on renegade menace.
Her blades pass sentence.
For cowards seek to hide their hearts,
but death makes no pretendence;
it takes what it is due in essence."

traits.locale_text:
«Pero algunos dejaron el camino recto,
debiendo penitencia.
Con tiempo,
su látigo fustiga a los renegados sin clemencia.
Son sus hojas las que dictan sentencia.
Pues los cobardes ocultan el corazón,
mas la muerte no tiene clemencia;
se lleva lo que le pertenece: su esencia».

languages.text:
「だが、正しき道とは別の道を選ぶ者いる。
やがて贖罪が待っている。
彼女の鞭が歌うは、憎き裏切り者への復讐。
その刃が下すは判決。
臆病者は心を隠すが、
死は欺かない。
それは本質的に奪っていく」
languages.original_text:
"But some would choose to leave the righteous path.
These earned penance in due time:
her whip sings vengeance on renegade menace.
Her blades pass sentence.
For cowards seek to hide their hearts,
but death makes no pretendence;
it takes what it is due in essence."

traits.locale_text:
「正しき道とは別の道を選ぶ者。
やがて贖罪が待っている。
彼女の鞭が歌うは、憎き裏切り者への復讐。
その刃が下すは判決。
臆病者は心臓を隠すが、
死がソレを許さない。
それは当然で必然だ」

languages.text:
“有的人抛弃了苦修与虔诚，
偏离了正义的道路。
审判到来时，她的长鞭颂唱正义的报复，
她的利刃将叛徒尽数屠戮。
软弱之人试图隐瞒内心，
但死亡从不为虚假蔽目，
它会带走它命定的猎物。”
languages.original_text:
"But some would choose to leave the righteous path.
These earned penance in due time:
her whip sings vengeance on renegade menace.
Her blades pass sentence.
For cowards seek to hide their hearts,
but death makes no pretendence;
it takes what it is due in essence."

traits.locale_text:
“有的人抛弃了苦修与虔诚，
偏离了正义的道路。
审判到来时，她的长鞭颂唱正义的报复，
她的利刃将叛徒尽数屠戮。
软弱之人试图隐瞒内心，
但死亡从不为虚假蔽目，
它会取走它应得的猎物。”

languages.text:
"Doch manche gingen vom rechten Weg ab.
Sie strafte ein Dekret schon bald:
Ihre Peitsche übt Rache für abtrünnige Bedrohung.
Ihre Klingen urteilen beredt.
Denn Feiglinge wollen ihr Herz verbergen,
doch der Tod ist indiskret.
Er nimmt sich, was ihm zusteht."
languages.original_text:
"But some would choose to leave the righteous path.
These earned penance in due time:
her whip sings vengeance on renegade menace.
Her blades pass sentence.
For cowards seek to hide their hearts,
but death makes no pretendence;
it takes what it is due in essence."

traits.locale_text:
"Aber manche gingen bewusst vom rechten Weg ab. Sie strafte ein Dekret
schon bald: Ihre Peitsche übt Rache für abtrünnige Bedrohung. Ihre Klingen urteilen beredt.
Denn Feiglinge wollen ihr Herz verbergen, doch der Tod ist indiskret.
Er nimmt sich, was ihm zusteht."

languages.text:
"Ama bazıları doğru yoldan ayrılmayı seçti.
Ve bunlar zamanla ceza çekti:
Kırbacı hain kötülükler için intikam şarkısı söyler.
Kılıçları cezalandırır.
Korkaklar kalplerini gizlemeye çalışır,
Ancak ölüm hile yapmaz.
Alır alınması gerekeni."
languages.original_text:
"But some would choose to leave the righteous path.
These earned penance in due time:
her whip sings vengeance on renegade menace.
Her blades pass sentence.
For cowards seek to hide their hearts,
but death makes no pretendence;
it takes what it is due in essence."
